scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && esbuild src/content/index.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/content/index.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 && esbuild src/popup/popup.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/popup/popup.js --platform=browser --target=es2020 && copyfiles -u 1 "src/**/*.html" "src/**/*.css" dist && copyfiles manifest.json dist && copyfiles -u 0 "icons/**/*" dist
